body:
Wow, you've come far.
A Tier 3 Rhythm Doctor eh?
That's pretty impressive.
Don't be too cocky, though.

Due to staff shortages...
You're going to be dealing with multiple patients at once from now on.
Ah, here they come now.
Sorry, no time for holding your hand through a tutorial.
Remember SPACE on the seventh beat and you'll do fine.
Well, good luck.

title: 2 Miss
body:
Aah, almost!
Try tapping out the ghost beats.
It seems to help the juniors here.

title: 2 Perfect
body:
Okay okay that's enough.
Mr or Mrs Smarty Pants.
Good!

Ah~!
Good.
Your next patient isn't really sick.
He's just suffering from excessive schmaltziness.
Hopefully you can snap him out of it.
Well, good luck.

title: 2 No Input
body:
Oh dear.
Remember to hit the spacebar on the SEVENTH BEAT.
